title: ‘This Gives a Psychological Kick’: Vingegaard Sees Personal Highlights Package in 2025 Tour de France
content:
Next year's Tour is loaded with climbs where Vingegaard stomped on Pogačar – but Visma-Lease a Bike accepts it needs to 'close the gap'.

Read the full article at ‘This Gives a Psychological Kick’: Vingegaard Sees Personal Highlights Package in 2025 Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
